name: Data engineer (Big Data team)
description: You will become a part of Big Data engineering team at a large US-based international company, leader in enterprise VoIP communication solutions, messaging and video conferencing. As a part of data engineering team, you will:  Develop new and improve existing database structures, ETLs, message streams and data records for better reliability, understandability and performance Design, develop and implement reports, business intelligence solutions, ML applications for decision making Constantly collaborate with US stakeholders and development team in St. Petersburg Create solutions and generate ideas that would drive the business growth Work with a cutting-edge enterprise technology stack with the ability to learn, contribute to architecture and leverage new tools  Your co-workers are experienced data analysts, scientists and engineers. Technology stack includes Spark, DataRobot, Hadoop, Impala, Vertica, MongoDB, HBase, etc. Skills & Requirements:  2+ years of experience in ETL, data engineering, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments Power user of Python 3 Confident knowledge of SQL Familiarity with relational, non-relational, graph and other databases Comfortable working in Linux shell Bachelor's Degree in Applied Mathematics, Statistics or equivalent Quick learner, open-minded and ability to think out-of-the-box Curiosity, strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication and documentation skills (both Russian and English) Positive attitude and team collaboration spirit Understanding of software architecture and engineering principles, development process  Would Be a Plus:  Experience in ML/AI, predictive analytics and statistics Experience with Enterprise analytics and BI Experience with Hadoop and Big Data technologies, ETL tools (Airflow, StreamSets, Oozie, NiFi) Java, Scala or other OOP/FP skills Experience in designing large data systems, back end development Experience with AWS or other cloud-based infrastructure and tools (EMR S3, Lambda, VPC, EC2, API Gateway)  Conditions:  Well coordinated professional team. Cutting edge technologies, interesting and challenging tasks, dynamic project, great opportunities for self-realization, professional and career growth. Corporate training programs, English language courses. Business trips (U.S., Philippines, China) and further work in the foreign branch office (U.S.). Job placement and payment of salary take place according to the labor code. Sick leaves 100% paid. 28 day vacation 100% paid in accordance with the current salary. Medical assistance (voluntary health insurance, dental insurance, office doctor). Great working conditions, modern business center, cycle parking, equipped kitchens, tea, coffee, soft drinks and sweets. Corporate events, trips, sports. Office in 15-minute walk from the subway. Nonresident applicants are granted Relocation Bonus and help in finding accommodation in St. Petersburg.
